sentences.sContent: You can helicopter to the island.
sentences.sCn: 你可以乘坐直升机去那个岛。

sentences.sContent: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.sContent_eng: The helicopter is staying over our heads.
sentences.sCn: 那架直升机就在我们头顶的上方。

sentences.sContent: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.sContent_eng: They were succoured from the fire by the rescue helicopter.
sentences.sCn: 他们被援救的直升机从大火中解救了出来。

remMethod.val: helico(螺旋)+pter(翅膀)→带螺旋翼的飞机→直升机

trans.tranOther: a type of aircraft with large metal blades on top which turn around very quickly to make it fly
